transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji. Hello. Sakil sir baat kar rahe hain Sakil sir?
Executive: Haan ji kaun bol raha hai?
Customer: Main Rohit se baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se. Aapko meeting ke liye baat hui thi.
Customer: Haan sir lekin main thoda aaj actual mein thoda busy hun. To aap ye meeting jo bhi hai aap kal ke liye schedule karwa sakte ho kya?
Executive: Kal ke liye actually kya hai financing mein maine bhi aapko connect kiya hua hai na shayad se.
Customer: Nahi wo baat thik hai lekin main thoda aaj kuch kaam mein uljha hua hun.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Isliye bol raha hun aap isko kal.
Executive: Suniye kya hai ki wo aapne not satisfied kar diya na to koi baat nahi matlab uske liye wo kiya gaya tha usko team ki taraf se.
Customer: Nahi nahi wo to main samajh gaya to aap mera ek kaam kijiye na aap kal subah 11 11 11 baje karwa dijiyega aap.
Executive: 11 baje?
Customer: Haan. Aaa thik hai main 11 baje karwa deta hun aur ho sake to try kar lijiye agar ho jaye to abhi.
Customer: Abhi to sir nahi ho payega actual mein maine abhi subah se ghar bhi nahi gaya khana wagera bhi nahi khaya thoda kaam mein busy hun.
Executive: Achcha aapne. Are haan. Achcha aap ye marble iski proper isi ka hi work karte hain properly?
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Yani aap kal subah ka 11 baje kal subah 11 baje ka karwa dijiye na main kal subah free ho ke pura dekh lunga na jo bhi hai.
Executive: Thik hai main karwa dunga aapko 11 baje phone na subah karwa dunga.
Customer: Okay sir. Okay thank you.
Executive: Okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is busy and wants to reschedule meeting.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to reschedule meeting for tomorrow.



Next Steps: 

- Meeting rescheduled for 11:00 AM tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- meeting, reschedule, busy
